"HOW TO PLAY: Minesweeper is a puzzle game in which the player must uncover all the cells that aren't mines without uncovering a mine cell. Cells can either be mines or the amount of mines in the 8 neighboring cells near them. The player can deduce from the non-mine cells where the mines could be at. Players can place a flag on a cell that they think is a mine. 
CONTROLS: Normal: • Tap a cell to reveal it • Tap and hold a cell to flag it • Tap a numbered cell that has that many flags near it to clear near unflagged cells ( Swift Open ) • Tap a empty cell to change your control mode swiftly ( Swift Change )
Flag: • Tap a cell to flag it • Tap and hold a cell to reveal it • Tap a numbered cell that has that many flags near it to clear near unflagged cells ( Swift Open ) • Tap a empty cell to change your control mode swiftly ( Swift Change ) 
SCORES: The scores are based on 3BV per second, which 3BV is a way to measure the difficulty of a Minesweeper board based off of the amount of clicks it would take to solve the board. 
SUPPORT: Please email the developer at drew.romanyk@gmail.com for any concerns or feedback."
Minesweeper is a free app provided by Drew Romanyk. Please contact him at drew.romanyk@gmail.com if you have any feedback.
